channel.title: Scientist tie glitch
channel.description:
Hello there, i have this problem with the Black Mesa: Steam Edition, the latest update. When i see the scientists moving or talking. The tie moves fast left and right constantly. Also sometimes, the ties have distortion. I need help and sorry of my bad english.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/JaPJHDd.jpg?1[/img]

item.title: Scientist tie glitch
item.dc:creator: CPU
item.description:
MatiasKiller21:
Agent6:

There isn’t much you can do unfortunately. It’s a very old and notorious issue which some people experience. It is supposedly caused by your machine not keeping up with the game well enough.

You could try reducing some settings and see what happens. The developers have tried a couple of times to fix it through patches, but so far, nothing successful.

Or, perhaps this: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=484571064

Thanks, works with the command.

In case that link ever disappears, here’s the info from the page:

Open up your in-game console and type in cl_jiggle_bone_framerate_cutoff 0.
This command fixes every jiggle bone glitch in the game (plants, ties, etc.)
